title: hanumanta nI balu
sahitya:
hanumanta nI balu jayavantanayya anumAnavilla Ananda tIrttarAya


caraNam 1    rAma sEvakanAgi rAvaNana purva nirdhUvama mADide nimiSadoLage 
bhUmiya putrige mudreyunguravittu kSEma kusha lava shrI rAma pAda karpiside
    caraNam 2    krSNAvatAradi bhImanAgi bandu duSTa daityaranella samhariside 
drSTi hIna dhrtarASTrana vamshavanu kaSTavillade kondu shrI krSNa pAda karpiside
    caraNam 3    patita shankara huTTi matavella keDisalu mati hInarAda sajjanarigella 
ati bEgadahali madhva yati rUpa dharisi sadgati pAlisidE purandara viTTalana dAsa
